name: BigPodcastRadio
0:
”Alexa ask Big Podcast Radio if it is on”
”Alexa ask Big Podcast Radio if it is on air”
”Alexa open Big Podcast Radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big podcast radio
des:
Big Podcast Radio - internet radio of legendary Russian speaking entertainer Vasily Strelnikov. 

The skill will help those who like to listen to his shows to know if the radio is up - most of the time the air is silent.

If the radio is up - you can listen it on its own website - http://bigpodcastradio.com/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
